channel.title: Request, ZOOM IN / ZOOM OUT
channel.description: i have been trying to figure out how to make the camera position closer to the character. and i have not been able to find anything on it or find anyone who was able to help. please help me! or if posable is it posible to make it first person view?

item.title: Request, ZOOM IN / ZOOM OUT

item.description:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:457333”]SetCameraPos

EDIT: Found a thread all about this in 1 minute on Google.[/quote]

It’s as simple as that.
This is the Server Development section, you should at least post in the correct board.
